name: Only One Download
description:
Prepare to live an adventure to be the master pirate of your house. 

  • Search in a sea of ads for the download button.
  •  Don't get caught by the false buttons or your PC will die.
  • Invest in your antivirus to avoid annoying virus.

And remember, there is only one button to download.

Game made by:

Abraham Armas Cordero

Marc Baqués Sàbat

Music by DL Sounds: Marimba Boy

All the ads are fake, and all the images are from free image stocks.

Game Jam GMTK 2019
